author: Vasudha Venugopal
title: Covid-19 outbreak: Arogya Setu wristbands to monitor patients’ movements
description: As the emphasis is on home quarantine, wristbands will help in remote monitoring, help health professionals know people’s temperature and symptoms. The numbers are going to be significant as more and more people will be asked to self-isolate, an official said.
content: New Delhi: The Centre is preparing to procure thousands of wristbands which will be embedded with its Arogya Setu app to monitor movements of patients in both hospital and house quarantine, and also help frontline workers take adequate care when they visit ho… [+2838 chars]
